body.p: The jTEI (Journal of the Text Encoding Initiative) document type is a highly restrictive customization (only about 80 elements are included) of the TEI P5 framework.

section.title: File Definition
Default Document Templates
section.p: There is a default jTEI Article template available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates and they can be found in: Framework Templates TEI JTEI .
The default template is located in the /frameworks/tei/templates/TEI jTEI folder.

section.title: Default Schema for Validation and Content Completion
section.p: The default schema that is used if one is not detected is tei_jtei.rng and it is stored in /frameworks/tei/xml/tei/custom/schema/relaxng/.

section.title: Default CSS
section.p: The default CSS file (jtei.css) that is used for rendering jTEI in Author mode is stored in /frameworks/tei/xml/tei/css/.
By default, these default CSS files are merged with any that are specified in the document. For more information, see .
